title: 丢弃物品消失的问题
author: hm1
txt_content: 我是海绵端，昨天修改了一下魔改和扫地插件之后服务器就无法扔掉东西，因为不知道哪可能出问题，所以毫无头绪，希望来给老哥说下思路，啥有可能造成这个东西~

replies.author: lengshao233
replies.txt_content: 能否上传扫地插件的配置文件

replies.author: wyd1542536763
replies.txt_content: 需要查看你的配置文件

replies.author: hm1
replies.txt_content:
wyd1542536763 发表于 2020-4-1 15:29
需要查看你的配置文件
"Entity Whitelist"=[
    "galacticraftcore:rocket_t1",
    "galacticraftplanets:rocket_t2",
    "galacticraftplanets:rocket_t3",
    "minecraft:boat"
]
Interval=15
Limits {
    "Entity Check Interval"=12
    "Hostile Limit"=400
    "Max Mobs Per Chunk"=1
    "Per Chunk Limit Enabled"=true
    "XP Orb Limit"=300
}
"Live Time" {
    "Min Item Live Time"=20
    enabled=false
}
Warnings=[
    870
]
Whitelist=[
    "minecraft:diamond",
    "minecraft:diamond_block",
    "minecraft:beacon",
    "galacticraftcore:rocket_t1",
    "galacticraftplanets:rocket_t2",
    "galacticraftplanets:rocket_t3",
    "appliedenergistics2:crystal_seed"
]

replies.author: 炫宙菌
replies.txt_content: 我记得……服务端根目录有一项貌似可以设置物品是否丢出去就销毁
